item.title: 【Helpdesk】How to Play Multi Channeled Music on iTunes / Apple Music
item.description:
Hi, I've downloaded the Dolby Atmos version of circus (6 channels each track) and In the Zone 360 audio (12 channels each) and all are .wav files - how do I get these to open up on iTunes / Apple Music and play? - they don't open up.

Normally, when I download dolby atmos for my iTunes / Apple - I switch the file to usually .mp4 and it ends up loading and playing on my iTunes and my iPhone - but it's not doing that anymore. Please help.
item.author: jojojava
